title: Why is there no Heartseeker twitch?
body: Vayne, Ashe, Varus have the skins. but nope! annie gets ANOTHER skin. This skin would amazing. Pls make it happen.

replies.body: Annie wasn't a heartseeker skin though.

Hey Canada Gabe! 

Heartseeker Varus was the 'Heartseeker' this year. While something hasn't happened yet, it doesn't mean it couldn't happen in the future!

i was expecting a heartseeker quinn or jinx. Jinx as lunar revel tho so once that happened i figured it had to be quinn..then cupid varus showed up and changed everything. Next year im guessing heartseeker taric and ezreal just after tarics rework finishes
all heartseeker skin are for adcs that use bows/crossbows, so probably twitch and quinn will get a heartseeker skin (ahse, vayne, varus, twitch and quinn are the only champions/adcs that use bows)

Well here's the thing, Twitch isn't exactly the "heartseeker" type.

Would you want to see an Heartseeker {{champion:6}} in an outfit like Varus?

Yeah, so when you're done swallowing back the vomit you can give your thoughts on that.
I actually want that skin though...
